name: Sage
description: The Software Engineer Backend, to be working three days a week at the Newcastle site, will build, enhance, automate and maintain products or systems using technologies like .NET C# framework, MySQL, JavaScript, and Node.js, while cross-collaborating with various teams and keeping up with technologies such as AI; should have 3+ years of relevant experience, startup mentality, and familiarity with Agile and SCRUM methodologies.
